subject: Stalking (Crime)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Patenema Ouedraogo was charged with stalking Serena Williams after security guards caught him trying to walk into her gated subdivision in Palm Beach Gardens, Fla., the police said.
snippet: Patenema Ouedraogo was charged with stalking Serena Williams after security guards caught him trying to walk into her gated subdivision in Palm Beach Gardens, Fla., the police said.
